TopicTitle: [WIP][1.6.x_TEMPORARY FIX] NAS - Naval Artillery System 0.7.0 (BDAc Addon, WW2 Naval Weapons) - "Land of Dragon" - 2018/4/28

Articles.Content: Ah man! Now i gotta reorder my battleships under construction! . JK. Amazing stuff
There's still a green light on a VLS hull section right. My development roadmap relies on it

I should have made it clear on OP that this is a pack of WW2 REPLICAS. Modern weapons like Mk45 are obviously out of consideration.

I thought that was pretty obvious? Maybe I was wrong though

Log:

Bob looks quite satisfied with his new toy, a twin Ma Deuce mount, which will be included in the next update.

We're beginning to test and modify our new parts to achieve a nice performance, it may take several days.
